adrFormatAddress: 40 E 12th St, New York, NY 10003-4904, USA

originalText.text: This review is long overdue. From the first time I went to Dryden I was instantly comfortable and confident in them. I have used them a total of 5  times primarily for concert prints, and am always 100% satisfied and have never had an issue with them at all. The first time I went there (Black Sabbath Poster) The Wonderfull Mary Dryden instantly started helping me and going over options for the concert print. Mary was very open to my opinions of the frame and mating options. She was also saying how much she loved the print and how she thought it was so pretty and well done. Mary also always lets me pay for the framing in stages which is very nice. While I was having my first print done with them I went in to make another payment and Mary had saved a news paper printing for me of the Black Sabbath concert that I had gone to. That really shows that she and all the staff that work there are very caring about their customers. If you are debating to go ahead and use Dryden Gallery & Custom Framing, I can say without a doubt in my mind that you should go ahead and use them, because you will be guaranteed to have a wonderful experience. I will continue to use them for any and all of my framing needs.

originalText.text: Beautiful frames, amazing customer service. My grandmother had left me a print that somehow fell out of its frame. The work they did to get it back to pristine shape was incredible and they even researched the provenance of the print and mounted that info onto the back of the frame! I had other works framed as well and there was great ideas and care given to each.

text.text: Beautiful frames, amazing customer service. My grandmother had left me a print that somehow fell out of its frame. The work they did to get it back to pristine shape was incredible and they even researched the provenance of the print and mounted that info onto the back of the frame! I had other works framed as well and there was great ideas and care given to each.

originalText.text: This place is great! I got a NYC subway map framed here and Mary, the sales associate, was a huge help. She even suggested the yellow frame which I never would’ve usually considered and am so happy I listened to her advice. The frame was done in two weeks and I was very happy with the results. Can’t recommend highly enough

She even suggested the yellow frame which I never would’ve usually considered and am so happy I listened to her advice. The frame was done in two weeks and I was very happy with the results. Can’t recommend highly enough

originalText.text: Dryden gallery is a family business that has been around for 40 years or more.   I am in interior designer and they are my absolute 'go to' framers.  They have options for all budgets and will tell you what is best for the work you present to them.  The gallery is easy to shop and the displays are extremely organized.  The proprietor, Mary, is a true villager and quite knowledgeable in art, periods, etc.  She will give you what is best, not what is most expensive.

originalText.text: Outstanding quality and service. The staff helped me select a frame for a sentimental painting. So glad I went with their suggestion. The results truly exceeded my expectations and complemented the piece. Will definitely recommend.
